main_article.title: A Tale of Two Celebrations
main_article.content: In an unprecedented celebration of love and culture, two extraordinary weddings are set to unfold across two continents. The first ceremony will take place in the historic city of Segovia, Spain, followed by a grand celebration in the majestic city of Udaipur, India.

spanish_wedding.title: Spanish Wedding
spanish_wedding.venue: Finca El Bosque Del Cati, Brieva
